Text: Defiance airs on April 15th, but sometimes legit copies of tv shows come out early (screeners, etc). Can people confirm this is a legitimate copy? I dare not download for fear it may be a trojan/worm/virus/etc.
If it's from scenetime, it's not a fake.

I just finished confirming this myself. Sort of. The Pilot episode of Defiance WAS released early. I repeat: The pilot episode WAS released early.

But... you can get a FREE copy @ amazon.com & view it instantly. So there be no need to DL this now.

It's better to wait those 2 days for proper copy than to waste your time on this... This is Defiance. But quality is awful. 2GB of minecraft... Video is made of 1mm cubes, real fps is around 5 from what I can see, sound seems to be slightly out of synch. Feels more like 50mb than 2gb.
